segments.text: I ’ d like to speak to marked Baker , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , Mr . Baker ’ s not in . May I take your message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , tell him Mr . Cook called and ask him to return my called as soon as he back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . Mr . Cook , I have Mr . baker called you back as soon as he gets here .
segments.speaker: S1
